Music Ministry

This is a ministry tha creates an atmosphere of praise and worship in church on Sundays, Fridays and other specials. Experience heartfelt worship, good friends and a refreshing look into God’s Word in a comfortable, casual setting.

Register below to join the Music Ministry group

I Have Decided

If you or a friend have recently made the life-transforming decision to follow Jesus, we want to help you as best as we can.

Groups

Our groups are relational, personal and informal. Meeting together every week to build friendships to share and process life's experiences.
